product_description: half sleeve dark blue t shirt with roundneck in medium size without human model

copy_data.primary_copy: Elevate your everyday style with this perfectly fitted dark blue half sleeve tee. Classic comfort meets modern design.
copy_data.headline: The Essential Half Sleeve You Need Now
copy_data.description: Ultra-soft cotton blend that keeps its shape all day. Versatile dark blue roundneck design pairs effortlessly with any outfit. Perfect for year-round wear.

claude_optimized_prompt: A photorealistic dark blue half-sleeve t-shirt floating elegantly against a soft gradient gray background, gentle studio lighting from top left, crisp fabric details and subtle wrinkles showing quality cotton texture, centered with rule-of-thirds composition, clean minimalist setting, professional product photography style

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic image of a dark blue half-sleeve t-shirt floating elegantly against a soft gradient gray background. Gentle studio lighting from the top left highlights the fabric and creates soft shadows. The t-shirt displays crisp details with subtle wrinkles, showcasing the quality of the cotton texture. The composition follows the rule-of-thirds, with the t-shirt centered for a clean and minimalist setting. The scene captures the essence of professional product photography, emphasizing simplicity and elegance.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: A photorealistic dark blue half-sleeve t-shirt floating elegantly against a soft gradient gray background, gentle studio lighting from top left, crisp fabric details and subtle wrinkles showing quality cotton texture, centered with rule-of-thirds composition, clean minimalist setting, professional product photography style
